org.apache.heron.common.testhelpers

Class CommunicatorTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.common.testhelpers.CommunicatorTestHelper

  • public final class CommunicatorTestHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Communicator test helper can spy on a communicator to provide the ability to await a certain number of expected offers to be received before proceeding.
